message.name: ERR_FV_RELATED_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A related type must be provided for this Approval Check.

message.name: ERR_FV_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: A type must be provided for this Approval Check.

message.name: ERR_FV_RELATEDID_MANDATORY
message.locale: A relatedID must be provided for this Approval Check.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TYPE_USER_AND_ORGANISATION_UNIT_INVALID
message.locale: An organization unit may not be entered when the type is user.
An organisation unit may not be entered when the type is user.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TYPE_USER_USERNAME_MANDATORY
message.locale: A username must be entered when the type is user.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TYPE_ORGANISATION_UNIT_AND_USERNAME_INVALID
message.locale: A username may not be entered when the type is organization unit.
A username may not be entered when the type is organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TYPE_ORGANISATION_UNIT_ORGANISATIONUNITID_MANDATORY
message.locale: An organization unit must be entered when the type is organization unit.
An organisation unit must be entered when the type is organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TYPE_RELATED_TYPE_AND_USERNAME_OR_ORGANISATION_UNIT_INVALID
message.locale: A username or organization unit may not be entered when the type is related type.
A username or organisation unit may not be entered when the type is related type.

message.name: ERR_FV_PERCENTAGE_INVALID_RANGE
message.locale: The Percentage must be equal to or greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

message.name: ERR_FV_PERCENTAGE_MUST_BE_WHOLE_NUMBER
message.locale: The Percentage must be a whole number.
